title: Google Chrome officially rolls out ‘Journeys’ history feature and Material You Android widgets
content:
Google Chrome is one of the most rapidly-evolving pieces of software in the world, with Google and many other companies contributing to its development. New features are showing up in Chrome on a regular basis, and now Google has announced an addition rolling out to Chrome on the desktop that can help organize your browsing

The post Google Chrome officially rolls out ‘Journeys’ history feature and Material You Android widgets appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is rolling out a new "Journeys" feature in Chrome that organizes your browser history into categories, and other changes.
